channel.title: Davidude36 - our newest GMod!

@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:58, topic:253762”][quote author=IP-Drowner link=topic=335236.msg2615196#msg2615196 date=1230989173]

WE NEED CHANGE

Why?

the vending machine doesnt take notes

it takes lead coins shaped to match a pound coin though

What does this have to do with anything?

we are having a party to celebrate davidude’s modding. And we need soda

Lucky i work at dominoes then! I’ll steal their soda machine!
[/quote]
and some pizza[/quote]
I’ll see how many of the blondes working there will be in on it and most of them will probably want to come, although no-one knows or heard of Davidude36!

item.title: Davidude36 - our newest GMod!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Lothy:

The desires of the masses do not influence staff decisions.

If they did, you’d have tarred & feathered and run out of MITB on a rail by now. Multiple times.

Also, congrats to Davidude. May this occasion go down in history as the first time someone who isn’t a complete asshole got modded.

Read full topic

item.title: Davidude36 - our newest GMod!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Yz85Racer:

Not saying anything about Davidude36’s ability to moderate, I respect that. I don’t respect the fact that, when 20 people at most, put “Davidude for GMOD” in their signature he is awarded the rank. Other than that, I am fine with Davidude36 being global moderator, he is easy to approach, and best of all, doesn’t treat it like it is his life, and actually interacts with the users.

I hardly believe that’s the reason he got the position. Probably was already a worthy possible candidate within discussion of becoming GMOD, and the fact that he is liked by the community and the community believes he deserves GMOD just completed the decision for them.

It was going to happen sooner or later.

Read full topic

[/quote]

I apologize, however I fail to see how I am unapproachable.[/quote]sup
